status.description: The development status of the setting. When missing, this property is inherited from parent nodes. If no parent node defines it, the default value is 'STABLE'.

VkFormatFeatureFlags.description: The platforms where the setting is available. When missing, this property is inherited from parent nodes. If no parent node defines it, the default value is all platforms.

VkFormatFeatureFlags2.description: The platforms where the setting is available. When missing, this property is inherited from parent nodes. If no parent node defines it, the default value is all platforms.

platforms.description: The platforms where the setting is available. When missing, this property is inherited from parent nodes. If no parent node defines it, the default value is all platforms.

capabilities.description: The block that specifies the list of capabilities sets.

name.description: The identifier of a capability block.

extensions.description: The block that stores required extensions.

features.description: The block that stores features requirements.

properties.description: The block that stores properties requirements.

formats.description: The block that store formats capabilities definitions.

name.description: The unique identifier of the profile.

label.description: The label used to present the profile to the Vulkan developer.

status.description: The developmet status of the profile: ALPHA, BETA, STABLE or DEPRECATED.

api-version.description: The Vulkan API version against which the profile is written.

contributors.description: The list of contributors of the profile.

history.description: The version history of the profile file

capabilities.description: The list of capability sets that can be reference by a profile.

fallback.description: The list of profiles recommended if the checked profile is not supported by the platform.
